arts.ttl: 'It's just unacceptable' - Frustrated Portsmouth boss John Mousinho reveals the three issues that made him confront referee at end of Burnley game
arts.sum: Frustrated John Mousinho has revealed what he said to match official David Webb at the end of Pompey’s 2-1 defeat at Burnley.

arts.ttl: Burnley 'well worthy' of 'massive win' vs Portsmouth, says Scott Parker while delivering huge praise to his side
arts.sum: Pompey return home disappointed after a stoppage time goal from Burnley denied them a result on the road.

arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings vs Portsmouth as four 7/10s and three 5/10s handed out - gallery
arts.sum: Josh Brownhill’s stoppage-time strike earned Burnley a hard-earned three points against a resilient and compact Portsmouth side.

arts.ttl: Outstanding Portsmouth defender pulls no punches as side handed harsh Burnley lesson
arts.sum: Regan Poole warned Pompey they have to quickly learn about the realities of Championship football after their Burnley heartache.

arts.ttl: 'I'm furious with the players': Fuming Portsmouth boss John Mousinho's agony after Burnley heartbreak
arts.sum: For a fuming John Mousinho, it was the toughest result to stomach during Pompey's difficult start to the season.

arts.ttl: Scott Parker's immediate reaction to Burnley's comeback win against Portsmouth
arts.sum: Scott Parker was delighted with the way his Burnley players managed their frustration to come from behind and record a last-ditch win against Portsmouth.

arts.ttl: 'Remarkable display. Costly misjudgement. Adds new dimension': Neil Allen's Portsmouth player ratings against Burnley
arts.sum: Pompey suffer late, late heartbreak as victory turned in an agonising defeat.

arts.ttl: 'Genuinely gutting. Simply unlucky. Not acceptable' - the Portsmouth reaction as Burnley claim last-gasp win against 'battling Blues'
arts.sum: Pompey fans on social media have been reacting to the Blues’ last-gasp defeat at the hands of Burnley.

arts.ttl: Josh Brownhill strikes at the death to delight Burnley and deny Portsmouth
arts.sum: Brownhill scored in the fourth minute of added time.

arts.ttl: Burnley 2-1 Portsmouth: Clarets leave it late to come from behind and snatch big three points
arts.sum: Burnley left it late to pick up a big three points against a stubborn and well-organised Portsmouth side.
